name: Yellow (snowli0n)
description:
Hi ! 😄

I'm a beginner in gamedev and I'm practicing in my free-time. This is actually my very first project in gaming.

Yellow is a basic 2D platformer made with Unity to learn how the engine works. As it's the first time I put my hands on gamedev, feel free to give your opinion and share your skills !

Oh and the game is meant to be played  for 5 or 10 minutes, that's it !

Enjoy ! 🕹
